alert.note: Alert for Briscoe; Floyd; Hale; Swisher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 3:39PM CDT until May 22 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Floyd County in northwestern Texas... Northeastern Hale County in northwestern Texas... Southeastern Swisher County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southwestern Briscoe County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 338 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles north of Claytonville, or 12 miles southeast of Tulia, moving southeast at 10 mph. Another storm near Kress is moving northeast and is expected to collide with this storm. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kress and Claytonville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
